attributes.action: right to refuse airport body scan
attributes.additional_details:
The right to refuse the airport full body scanner and opt for a pat down .
Britian is the only country  in the world that has a no scan no fly policy. In Europe and the US, you have the option to have a body search by staff. Researchers and Doctors have found that these  scanners could cause cancer and cell deformities . these scanners have not been around long enough to prove that they are safe .
This is another infringement of civil liberties.
